summary: A beautiful and powerful destruction mage follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Pyrq1Gi.jpg[/IMG][/center]

-Jamille is a completely standalone mod, so you do not need any other mod installed to have her at full function.
-She is essential.
-You will find her at The Arcanaeum in the College of Winterhold.
-Jamille is a Destruction Mage, she uses Ice, Fire and Lighning spells to put enemies down.
-She has Light Armor perks.
-In battle she will hold back and attack from distance, she is very powerful at ranged attacks, this makes her a non tanker, in close battles she can handle herself as well, but not as good as in ranged.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1Ysj3ew.jpg[/IMG]

Jamille grew up with her father, a very hardworking miner in Skyrim. But as time went by, he got older and passed away, at his deathbed, he told Jamille -Follow, your dreams.-
Jamille then decided to take the step in her life, and make her father proud. 
she traveled to Winterhold, and decided that she would become one of the most powerful mages Skyrim would have ever had.
Five years have passed since she arrived at the college of Winterhold. Jamille now is twenty five years old, and keeps eager on improving her powers. 
Now she awaits to join a great warrior, and travel all around Tamriel, putting her skills into practice.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mQeRimb.jpg[/IMG]

Se looks fantastic with these mods!

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39959]Ultimate Assortment by Favoredsoul[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27064]KDCirclets Redone by zzjay[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077]Tribunal Robes and Masks by Zairaam and Natterforme[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5696]Arise - Chapter 1 - The Black Sacrament by AmethystDeceiver[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19377]Imperial Investigator Armor UNP - UNPB by Calyps[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22607]Imperial Investigator Retexture by DreamBurrow[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors by hothtrooper44[/url]
-[url=http://rim-rim-fox.tumblr.com/post/42497197744/2-2]Kankaraya by Kanra[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37012]Witcher 2 - Nilfgaardian Mage Outfit by WesleyWalesAnderson[/url]
also...
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii[/url]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UXm77OC.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks to each one that made these amazing mods, without your amazing work, Jamille would not be possible. You are awesome!!!

-Hair by Hello Santa
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35713]ECEE - Enhanced Character Edit Enhancer by RAN46[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624]RaceMenu by Expired[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team[/url]
-Nexus and Bethesda for supporting the modding community.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sVSgvv8.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks, [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton]hodilton[/url]. For the beautiful featured video!

[youtube]OmdP7-hhwns[/youtube]

[b]===Requirements===[/b]
Recommended Skyrim version 1.9.32.0.8 or later. May also work with earlier versions.
-------
-How to make the BBP body types work?

First, Download and install a skeleton mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url].
Second, Download and install an animation mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35035]Natural Breast Animation by DarkAngel1265[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29408]Female Animation Pack by NonokuraSan[/url].
After these mods are installed, the bodies should work properly.

[b]===Installation===[/b]
I recommend to use NMM, download with manager and activate. Or if you want to manually install, extract all the files into your Data folder.

[b]===Uninstallation===[/b]
-First, dismiss Jamille as your followers. Save your game and Quit to desktop.
-Second, if you are using NMM, just remove it from the manager.
For a manual uninstallation, delete these files and folders:
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\JamilleFurann
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\JamilleFurann.esp
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\JamilleFurann
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\JamilleFurann.esp
Data\\JamilleFurann.esp

[b]===About Permissions===[/b]
Please, do not upload this mod anywhere without giving the proper credits.
If you want to use Jamille in your mod, please notify me first, and don\'t forget to include me in the credits.

[b]===Known Issues===[/b]
-The previous issues were all fixed.
If anyone find any problem in the latest version, please let me know!

Thank you, everyone! For the great support and appreciation!!
Keep suggestions and issue reports coming!

[b]===Change Log===[/b]
(09/16/2013)- [b]v1.3[/b] - Fixed purple hair texture; fixed toothless mouth; Fixed face skin; Added CBBE-BBP and UNPB-BBP body types
(09/13/2013)- [b]v1.2[/b] - Better battlestyle; unused bow removed.
(09/13/2013)- [b]v1.1[/b] - Fixed neck seam; fixed UNP and derivated version\'s hands collor unneveness; marriage now should work fine.
(09/09/2013)- [b]v1.0[/b] - Initial release.

-------

-I am using a personal made ENB on the screenshots, maybe I will put it on Nexus sometime.

-My intention is to make Jamille unique. I want to make her voice acted, add a questline and a lot more good things to her, so I will try to improve much more at skyrim modding and be accepting as much help I can.
At the moment, I will be working on bugfixes and some tweaks only. Although, I will do requested changes if really needed, so feel free to give me suggestions and report issues.
This is my first mod, so I\'m still learning a lot!

I really appreciate your appreciation! :)
-------

-Special thanks to all my friends and colleagues from Facebook, home and work that encouraged me while doing this mod. Doing it by myself, only with internet tutorials and videos, was not easy...

-------

I hope you all like her!
Please, enjoy!!

...e Vai, Corinthians!

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JBK2tm3.gif[/IMG] Chaquinho89
author: Chaquinho89
